# GitHub Actions Status Badges

Add these badges to your main README.md to show build status:

## Build Status Badge
```markdown
[![Build ESP32S3 Firmware](https://github.com/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS/actions/workflows/build-esp32s3.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS/actions/workflows/build-esp32s3.yml)
```

## Latest Release Badge
```markdown
[![Latest Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS)](https://github.com/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS/releases/latest)
```

## Pre-release Badge
```markdown
[![Pre-release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS?include_prereleases&label=pre-release)](https://github.com/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS/releases)
```

## Combined Example
```markdown
# robOS

[![Build ESP32S3 Firmware](https://github.com/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS/actions/workflows/build-esp32s3.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS/actions/workflows/build-esp32s3.yml)
[![Latest Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS)](https://github.com/thomas-hiddenpeak/robOS/releases/latest)

Your project description here...
```
